subject: Re: Some form tonight
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
The Christmas voice is code talk--Christmas comes in the 12th month, 
and I think these are a veiled way of saying 2012.

 I was just watching a History Channel show on the Bible Code (II), and 
thinking it's the same thing with the voices. Researchers presume they 
are wise enough to ask the Great Spirit questions. My advice--shut up 
and listen! It won't put you in the spot light, but it might bring 
illumination.

 Frank-S
